content: संक्रम् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To come or meet together. {@--2@} To traverse, cross, go or pass through. {@--3@} To approach, go. {@--4@} To go over or be transferred (to another). {@--5@} To enter on or in; कालो ह्ययं संक्रमितुं द्वितीयं सर्वोपकारक्षममाश्रमं ते <ls>R. 5. 10.</ls> {@--6@} To be present at, attend. {@--7@} To surmount. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To transfer. {@--2@} To devolve, consign, entrust; ब्राह्मणसंक्रमिताक्षरेण पितामहेन <ls>V. 3</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 78.</ls> {@--3@} To deliver, hand over. {@--4@} To convey, lead towards. {@--5@} To take possession of, {@--6@} To promise mutual assistance.
